cache.title: Execution Cache
cache.description:
Skip execution if the outputs of the cell, such as assigned variables and imported modules, already exist.
This option can be overridden with 'Execution Cache' config in '## Cell Inspector' panel or '##%cache' client-side magic command.
This behavior can be disabled by checking 'Disable Execution Cache'.

autoDependency.title: Auto Dependency
autoDependency.description:
Execute dependent cells if unresolved variables or modules of the cell are assigned in the cells above.
This option can be overridden with 'Auto Dependency' config in '## Cell Inspector' panel.
This behavior can be disabled by checking 'Disable Auto Dependency'.

forceOnSingleCell.title: Force Execution on Single Cell
forceOnSingleCell.description: When running only one cell, cache or skip configurations are ignored.

disableCache.title: Disable Execution Cache
disableCache.description: Disable the cache feature completely, including 'Execution Cache' config and '##%cache' client-side magic command.

disableAutoDependency.title: Disable Auto Dependency
disableAutoDependency.description: Disable the auto dependency feature completely, including 'Auto Dependency' config.

disableSkip.title: Disable Cell Execution Skip
disableSkip.description: Disable the skip feature completely, including 'Skip' config and '##%skip' client-side magic command.
